title: Sand Poacher
summaries: The Sand Poacher is a Hardmode enemy that spawns in the Underground Desert biome. Following the Spider AI, it will follow and attempt to deal contact damage to the player while also being capable of climbing onto background walls. If the Sand Poacher is climbing on a wall and detects the player within its line of sight, its movement speed increases drastically, making escape more difficult for the player. Upon contact, the Sand Poacher also inflicts the Acid Venom debuff for 4 seconds.
